title: Hack your brain — Get lifetime Babbel to access AI-powered language tools
content:
Macworld

Learning a new language is one of the most innovative ways to future-proof your brain, and thanks to Babbel’s AI-enhanced platform, it’s never been easier. For today only, you get lifetime access to all 14 of Babbel’s languages for $129.99 (MSRP $599) when you use code LEARN40 — ends May 4.

Babbel combines expert-designed lessons with smart tech features, including speech recognition and adaptive review sessions for a personalized, ad-free language learning experience that sticks. No gimmicks, no monthly fees — just practical lessons you can finish in 10–15 minutes a day, online or offline.

Whether you’re preparing for international travel, expanding your career, or want to flex those neuroplasticity muscles, Babbel helps you speak with confidence.

Use code LEARN40 to get lifetime access to Babbel Language Learning for $129.99 via StackSocial — this exclusive offer ends today, May 4, at 11:59 PM PST.
